answers.author: Roderick Wood
answers.text:
Be sure to include adjacencies of functions and support space like janitors closets, coffee areas, library and reference.  I am certain many can send you current studies.  Also look at the reports by consultants as the end product is public record as they can give you good insights.

author: CJ Mikucki
text:
Hi all,
We're looking into doing an internal space utilization assessment.  Although the alternative would be to hire a firm to complete the task for us, has any municipality conducted their own?  Are the benchmarks and recommendations feasible and comparable to those of external firms?  Can you post documents if you've completed an assessment (please include those of external assessments -- we want to know the processes, information/data collection, and analysis).
Thanks in advance!
title: Space Utilization Assessment (Internal)
